Question: Premiere magazine also ranked this person on their list of The 100 Greatest Movie Characters of All Time.
Hints: In the novel Splinter of the Mind's Eye (1978), this person and Luke duel, and Luke cuts off this person's right arm.
Many films and television series have paid homage to this person.
This person brings Luke onto the second Death Star, where the Emperor tries to seduce Luke to the dark side.
